title: Publication scheme

details.body:
You can find specific documents for the Parole Board by using the publication search.

If the information you want is not routinely published, you can make a request for it under the Freedom of Information Act.

You can also search through previous responses to Freedom of Information requests.

Who we are and what we do

Information covering organisational and contact details, including our:

  • framework document

What we spend and how we spend it

This includes our:

  • annual report and accounts for 2012 to 2013

Our priorities and how weâ€™re doing

This includes our:

  • business plan for 2011 to 2015
  • business plan for 2013 to 2014

Our policies and procedures

Including our:

  • risk management policy and guidelines

Lists and registers

Information required by law about the functions of the authority, including:

Services we offer

Advice leaflets and media releases, including:

  • information for victims and their families
  • information for prisoners and their families

description: The categories of information that the Parole Board publishes and how to get that information.
